Headline: Harlem-bound Green, Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green & Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green & Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
